title: Giro d’Italia Rider Sees Miracle Escape after Falling Deep into Ravine
content:
Shocking images capture Giro rider Alessio Martinelli being winched out of gorge after high-speed fall before being cleared of fractures or other serious injuries.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Rider Sees Miracle Escape after Falling Deep into Ravine on Velo.
